item.title: What is Brain Computer Interface?
item.description: Direct communication with the brain, not a joke!

item.title: Welcome to Blognova!
item.description:
Hello World and welcome all!

I have always desired a corner in the net where I can show my online presence. I am quite bored with social networks, so I thought it is time to create the corner of my own. Although I am a just fine at front-end design. This one here stabbed my heart by the way It uses my favorite color red. Any obsessive guy (like me) shall love it, donâ€™t worry. The blog design is inspired from Simplest theme of Fernando Moreira. It is MIT licensed. Use it freely :)

Note that the blog is hosted in Github servers and created by magic of Jekyll. It is totally free of charge.
